id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-workplace-organizational-teen's paid work recognized as care labor
title: Teen's paid work recognized as care labor
description: Teen's paid work recognized as care labor
content:
Scenario: Teen's paid work recognized as care labor
    Given Jasmine works in retail serving customers
    And traditional economics treats this as market transaction only
    When workplace_elohim processes her work
    Then it should recognize that her labor is care work
    And helping customers find what they need is care
    And supporting co-workers is care
    And contributing to community through her work is care
    And she should learn to see all work through care economy lens
    And understand that service work is valuable care labor
    And expect her work to be valued as contribution to collective flourishing
